data.text:
WHAT: Children’s candle-making classes

WHO: Children ages 8-14, accompanying adult required (age 18 +)

WHERE: At a Candlefish near you

WHY: Because it’s super fun!

Candlefish is happy to announce our newest candle making class designed specifically for aspiring young chandlers! Join us in the Candlefish workshop for a parent/child candle making class, sniff through the Library of fragrances, pour up some candles, and learn a new skill with your young one. Classes are designed for chandlers ages 8-14 with one accompanying adult per junior chandler.
